title: 'She has no role...': What Florida governor DeSantis said about Harris's involvement in hurricane response
content: Florida governor Ron DeSantis criticised Kamala Harris for attempting to involve herself in the hurricane response, stating she has no role in it. DeSantis emphasised his collaboration with President Joe Biden and FEMA, accusing Harris of politicising the disaster for her campaign.
summary: Florida governor Ron DeSantis criticised Kamala Harris for attempting to involve herself in the hurricane response, stating she has no role in it. DeSantis emphasised his collaboration with President Joe Biden and FEMA, accusing Harris of politicising the disaster for her campaign.

title: TD Bank pleads guilty to money laundering violations, agrees to $3 billion penalty
content: TD Bank, the largest bank to date to admit to US Bank Secrecy Act violations, pleads guilty to money laundering-related charges and agrees to $3 billion in penalties. The Justice Department cites pervasive compliance failures over a decade. An asset cap limits TD's US operations, and CEO Bharat Masrani plans to retire, taking responsibility for the issues.
summary: TD Bank, the largest bank to date to admit to US Bank Secrecy Act violations, pleads guilty to money laundering-related charges and agrees to $3 billion in penalties. The Justice Department cites pervasive compliance failures over a decade. An asset cap limits TD's US operations, and CEO Bharat Masrani plans to retire, taking responsibility for the issues.

title: Has Kate Middleton given up on reuniting Prince William and Prince Harry? What royal experts say
content: Kate Middleton has ceased mediating between Prince William and Prince Harry. After completing preventive chemotherapy, she is now prioritizing her health and family. Tensions persist within the royal family, with minimal communication between Harry, Meghan, and the palace.
summary: Kate Middleton has ceased mediating between Prince William and Prince Harry. After completing preventive chemotherapy, she is now prioritizing her health and family. Tensions persist within the royal family, with minimal communication between Harry, Meghan, and the palace.

title: Ethel Kennedy, wife of Robert F Kennedy, dies at 96​​
content: Ethel Kennedy, widow of Robert F Kennedy, passed away at 96 due to complications from a stroke. A resilient matriarch, she maintained the Kennedy legacy while raising 11 children. Kennedy founded the Robert F Kennedy Centre for Justice and Human Rights, advocating for social causes throughout her life. She is remembered for her enduring strength and contributions to maintaining the Kennedy family's legacy.
summary: Ethel Kennedy, widow of Robert F Kennedy, passed away at 96 due to complications from a stroke. A resilient matriarch, she maintained the Kennedy legacy while raising 11 children. Kennedy founded the Robert F Kennedy Centre for Justice and Human Rights, advocating for social causes throughout her life. She is remembered for her enduring strength and contributions to maintaining the Kennedy family's legacy.

title: NYT-Siena poll indicates Democrats may soon lose Senate control
content: The upcoming senate elections could shift power to Republicans, with Montana's Jon Tester trailing Tim Sheehy 52% to 44%, impacting Democrats' slim majority. Significant advertising spending underscores the contentious race, while other key Democratic-held Senate seats also face tight competition.
summary: The upcoming senate elections could shift power to Republicans, with Montana's Jon Tester trailing Tim Sheehy 52% to 44%, impacting Democrats' slim majority. Significant advertising spending underscores the contentious race, while other key Democratic-held Senate seats also face tight competition.

title: 'Still a principled conservative': Meghan McCain reveals why she is not endorsing Trump or Harris
content: Meghan McCain confirms she will not endorse either Kamala Harris or Donald Trump in the upcoming election, citing her commitment to being a principled conservative like her late father, John McCain. Despite her brother Jimmy's endorsement of Harris, Meghan maintains there is no family drama.
summary: Meghan McCain confirms she will not endorse either Kamala Harris or Donald Trump in the upcoming election, citing her commitment to being a principled conservative like her late father, John McCain. Despite her brother Jimmy's endorsement of Harris, Meghan maintains there is no family drama.

title: Kate Middleton, Prince William reunite for first joint appearance after her chemotherapy
content: Prince William and Kate visited Southport to meet families of the three girls murdered at a Taylor Swift-themed event in July. This marked Kate's first public engagement since ending her chemotherapy treatment. The couple aimed to show support to the community recovering from the attack, which had sparked nationwide riots and disinformation.
summary: Prince William and Kate visited Southport to meet families of the three girls murdered at a Taylor Swift-themed event in July. This marked Kate's first public engagement since ending her chemotherapy treatment. The couple aimed to show support to the community recovering from the attack, which had sparked nationwide riots and disinformation.

title: 'Oops' moment for BBC: Apology issued after weather app gaffe shows 'hurricane winds' in London
content: The BBC apologizes for a technical error in its weather app that incorrectly forecasted extreme weather conditions, including hurricane-force winds and temperatures of 404°C. The Met Office provides accurate updates, noting the UK's expected weather and ruling out the current possibility of hurricane impacts.
summary: The BBC apologizes for a technical error in its weather app that incorrectly forecasted extreme weather conditions, including hurricane-force winds and temperatures of 404°C. The Met Office provides accurate updates, noting the UK's expected weather and ruling out the current possibility of hurricane impacts.

title: Taiwan’s president signals he’ll stand up to China challenge
content: Taiwan President Lai Ching-te vowed to combat challenges from China, affirming Taiwan’s sovereignty during his National Day speech. He emphasized maintaining peace and stability in the Taiwan Strait while expressing willingness to collaborate on various issues, including climate change. Lai also addressed high housing prices, promising measures to control the market.
summary: Taiwan President Lai Ching-te vowed to combat challenges from China, affirming Taiwan’s sovereignty during his National Day speech. He emphasized maintaining peace and stability in the Taiwan Strait while expressing willingness to collaborate on various issues, including climate change. Lai also addressed high housing prices, promising measures to control the market.

title: UK Rapper and influencer Yung Filly arrested over rape and assault allegations in Australia
content: British rapper Yung Filly, facing serious charges of rape and assault, appeared in a Perth court. His bail was contested due to his extensive social media following and financial resources, raising concerns about witness interference and flight risk. A decision on bail is pending, with proposed measures to restrict social media activity.
summary: British rapper Yung Filly, facing serious charges of rape and assault, appeared in a Perth court. His bail was contested due to his extensive social media following and financial resources, raising concerns about witness interference and flight risk. A decision on bail is pending, with proposed measures to restrict social media activity.

title: Teachers in Texas use sleeping patches on 4-year-olds
content: Two teachers at Northgate Crossing Elementary in Texas were removed and are under police investigation after allegedly using melatonin-infused stickers to calm students. Parents reported disrupted sleeping patterns and other issues in their children. The school has placed the teachers and two paraprofessionals on administrative leave and confirmed the violation of medication policy.
summary: Two teachers at Northgate Crossing Elementary in Texas were removed and are under police investigation after allegedly using melatonin-infused stickers to calm students. Parents reported disrupted sleeping patterns and other issues in their children. The school has placed the teachers and two paraprofessionals on administrative leave and confirmed the violation of medication policy.

title: 'It's a live broadcast': Harris stumbles during hurricane Milton meeting; MAGA says 'total incompetence'
content: US Vice President Kamala Harris faces criticism after a Hurricane Milton briefing with FEMA, where she appeared to struggle during a live broadcast. Harris, along with President Joe Biden, was updated on the hurricane's forecast and potential impacts in Florida. MAGA supporters criticized her, citing apparent signs of unpreparedness and reliance on notes.
summary: US Vice President Kamala Harris faces criticism after a Hurricane Milton briefing with FEMA, where she appeared to struggle during a live broadcast. Harris, along with President Joe Biden, was updated on the hurricane's forecast and potential impacts in Florida. MAGA supporters criticized her, citing apparent signs of unpreparedness and reliance on notes.

title: Pro-Russian 'sleeper agent' bots on X push US election misinformation: Study
content: Hundreds of pro-Russian bot accounts on X have been spreading misinformation about the US election and Democratic candidate Kamala Harris, according to the American Sunlight Project. Some of these bots, active for up to 15 years, promote pro-Kremlin propaganda and support Donald Trump. Data restrictions after Elon Musk’s acquisition of X have made tracking these bots challenging.
summary: Hundreds of pro-Russian bot accounts on X have been spreading misinformation about the US election and Democratic candidate Kamala Harris, according to the American Sunlight Project. Some of these bots, active for up to 15 years, promote pro-Kremlin propaganda and support Donald Trump. Data restrictions after Elon Musk’s acquisition of X have made tracking these bots challenging.

title: 'Trying to spark chaos': US Republicans on hurricane misinformation spread by own party members
content: Several congressional Republicans, including Representatives Chuck Edwards and Carlos Gimenez, are speaking out against conspiracy theories about weather manipulation spread by their own party members, particularly Marjorie Taylor Greene. They emphasize the need for fact-checking and relying on reputable sources during natural disasters.
summary: Several congressional Republicans, including Representatives Chuck Edwards and Carlos Gimenez, are speaking out against conspiracy theories about weather manipulation spread by their own party members, particularly Marjorie Taylor Greene. They emphasize the need for fact-checking and relying on reputable sources during natural disasters.

title: Sean Diddy's legal team accuse US government of leaking Cassie assault footage
content: Sean 'Diddy' Combs' attorneys accuse federal agents of leaking surveillance footage showing him abusing ex-girlfriend Cassie, leading to public outrage and a forced apology. They argue that the leak harms Combs' chance for a fair trial. Prosecutors deem the footage key evidence, linking it to charges of sex trafficking and more. Combs denies all allegations.
summary: Sean 'Diddy' Combs' attorneys accuse federal agents of leaking surveillance footage showing him abusing ex-girlfriend Cassie, leading to public outrage and a forced apology. They argue that the leak harms Combs' chance for a fair trial. Prosecutors deem the footage key evidence, linking it to charges of sex trafficking and more. Combs denies all allegations.

title: Hurricane Milton hits Florida, leaving over 1 million without power
content: Hurricane Milton made landfall in Florida as a Category 3 storm, bringing 120 mph winds, a deadly storm surge, and widespread flooding. Over 1 million homes are without power, and 5.5 million residents were ordered to evacuate. Governor DeSantis and President Biden have urged residents to take the storm seriously.
summary: Hurricane Milton made landfall in Florida as a Category 3 storm, bringing 120 mph winds, a deadly storm surge, and widespread flooding. Over 1 million homes are without power, and 5.5 million residents were ordered to evacuate. Governor DeSantis and President Biden have urged residents to take the storm seriously.

title: Youth facing unprecedented wave of violence, UN envoy warns
content: Young people are increasingly subjected to violence and sexual abuse due to war, climate change, hunger, and displacement, according to UN's Najat Maalla M'jid. Her forthcoming report highlights the severity of the crisis, urging coordinated international efforts to address the multifaceted issues affecting children's safety and well-being.
summary: Young people are increasingly subjected to violence and sexual abuse due to war, climate change, hunger, and displacement, according to UN's Najat Maalla M'jid. Her forthcoming report highlights the severity of the crisis, urging coordinated international efforts to address the multifaceted issues affecting children's safety and well-being.

title: Saudi Arabia loses bid for seat on UN's premier human rights body
content: Saudi Arabia failed to secure a seat in the UN Human Rights Council following accusations of serious rights violations by rights groups. The 193-member General Assembly elected 18 new council members from regional groups to ensure geographical representation, with Thailand, Cyprus, Qatar, South Korea, and Marshall Islands taking the Asia-Pacific seats.
summary: Saudi Arabia failed to secure a seat in the UN Human Rights Council following accusations of serious rights violations by rights groups. The 193-member General Assembly elected 18 new council members from regional groups to ensure geographical representation, with Thailand, Cyprus, Qatar, South Korea, and Marshall Islands taking the Asia-Pacific seats.

title: Biden, Netanyahu spoke for 30 minutes; it was direct, honest, productive: White House
content: ​The call comes amid tensions between Biden and Netanyahu and was their first since August 21, a seven-week gap during which Israel also launched an offensive against Hezbollah in Lebanon. Biden has cautioned Israel against attempting to target Iran's nuclear program and is also against a strike on the country's oil installations, which would send oil prices spiking less than a month before the US presidential election.
summary: ​The call comes amid tensions between Biden and Netanyahu and was their first since August 21, a seven-week gap during which Israel also launched an offensive against Hezbollah in Lebanon. Biden has cautioned Israel against attempting to target Iran's nuclear program and is also against a strike on the country's oil installations, which would send oil prices spiking less than a month before the US presidential election.

title: Harry wants to sit down and talk with Meghan Markle about future as...
content: Harry extended his abroad trip while Meghan made a surprise appearance at a Red Carpet event in California where she wore a bold, red dress in an attempt to send a message of her own individual identity -- apart from Harry and the Royal Family. In fact, experts said her choice of dress was a message to the Royal Family and Hollywood that she is not hiding and ready to reinvent herself.
summary: Harry extended his abroad trip while Meghan made a surprise appearance at a Red Carpet event in California where she wore a bold, red dress in an attempt to send a message of her own individual identity -- apart from Harry and the Royal Family. In fact, experts said her choice of dress was a message to the Royal Family and Hollywood that she is not hiding and ready to reinvent herself.
